title: Jack Reacher
creator_credit: Paramount, Mutual Film Company, TC Productions, Skydance Media, H2L Media "AKA" Mutual Film Company, H2L Media Group, Susan Matheson, Don Granger, Christopher McQuarrie, James D. Bissell, Gary Levinsohn, Tom Cruise and Paula Wagner
brief_description: When a gunman takes five lives with six shots, all evidence points to the suspect in custody. On interrogation, the suspect offers up a single note: “Get Jack Reacher!” So begins an extraordinary chase for the truth, pitting Jack Reacher against an unexpected enemy, with a skill for violence and a secret to keep.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

recommendations.quote: In an unusual move for films within the action genre, Jack Reacher (2012) opens with the first eight minutes of the film entirely dialogue free. It's one of the unique storytelling choices from writer/director Christopher McQuarrie that made it a global hit.

creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, Mutual Film Company, TC Productions, Skydance Media, H2L Media “AKA” Mutual Film Company, H2L Media Group, Susan Matheson, Don Granger, Christopher McQuarrie, James D. Bissell, Gary Levinsohn, Tom Cruise and Paula Wagner
